WorkItem.Description:
Its telling me to reforge Crit into mastery when mastery is already present on my cloak.
It also tells me to get another meta gem that requires yellow gems when it says I should use red agility gems exclusively. Wich leads to the meta requirements not being fulfilled.

Comments.Message:
Loading the file, it looks like the default cache doesn't have mastery on that cloak, which is why it would suggest Crit -> Mastery reforging. Adding the stat onto the item stops that. I will have Hina upload an updated cache that has Mastery on that item

Looking at the Metas now

Templates for the new Agility Meta were never added and it looks like the Cogwheel templates were never changed from stating Bear to stating Cat. Gemming templates generator now creates template sets for Fleet, Chaotic and Agile metas (instead of just Fleet).

Also, your character file doesn't have its Glyphs set, please be sure to set them so your calculations are more accurate.
